evidence.claim: Universe univ:nouns is licensed under CC0-1.0

attestation.notes: CC0 declared explicitly by NounsDAO in the project's on-chain governance and site. License page at nouns.wtf confirms CC0-1.0. Trademark risk flag documented: the Nouns visual identity (square glasses, pixelated style) is strongly associated with the brand name 'Nouns' — medium trademark risk for commercial use that trades on the name or distinctive aesthetic. No governance ambiguity; DAO is active and well-established. Confidence high pending trademark flag resolution — capped at 0.8 per project file specification ('High (pending TM flag)').
